title: Hierarchical Problem-Solving Task Design for Enhancing Language Proficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and managerial-level work experience
context.additional_context: Focus on self-directed learning in BYOD environments and cultivating practical problem-solving skills applicable to work

learning_goals: Learners can solve three-tier hierarchical language problems with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can apply knowledge acquired from solving difficulty-based problems to new language problems with a success rate of over 70%.
Learners will be able to systematically analyze and resolve language-related issues encountered in work environments after completing the course.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
